This is a Brain teasing game to test your memorizing skills.

GamePLay
Click on the ready! button whenever you are ready.Wait for the pattern to disappear to the left. When it completely goes off the screen try to press the matching buttons sequentially. Failed to match the sequence will result in Game Over.

Change Profile
 Write different names to play as different users


Score
Scores are distributed level wise the higher the level the higher you will score.
